summary: Two new enchantments to help assassins, thieves and hunters. Adding 'Detect Beings', similar to Detect Life but as an enchantment, as well as 'Tracking' to help track your pray. Requires SKSE.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Hunter's Enchantments[/size]
This mods adds two new enchantments to help assassins, thieves and hunters.
[size=3][u]Requires SKSE.[/u][/size]

[size=4]Detect Beings[/size]
Similar to Detect Life but as an enchantment and also showing undead beings.
I made it so creatures hiding, like Draugr in tombs, are not visible to not ruine the surprise, those are only shown when necoming active.
There's also a distinction between agressive and friendly beings. This is just an indication, some beings only become agressive once they see you.

[size=4]Tracking[/size]
Helping to track your pray. When you hit a creature with a waepon with this enchantment, it'll get a glow that can be seen through walls. The glow will stay visible much farther than Detect Beings.

I hope you like it, let me know if something's broken!
author: The Oddler
